H0.text: what was the population of the roman empire at its height. 50 million

H3.text: what was the population of the roman empire at its height. 70 million

A4.text: The Roman Empire's population has been estimated at between 59 and 76 million in the 1st and 2nd centuries.

A5.text: Historian Kyle Harper suggests 75 million for the empire as a whole.
